meanings.definition: The process of forming an ulcer.
meanings.sent1: The ulceration on his leg was painful.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the ulceration as a serious condition.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, the ulceration seemed to worsen.
meanings.sent4: Her neglect of the wound led to ulceration spreading like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The ulceration oozed with infection, a gruesome sight.

meanings.sent1: She winced in pain from the ulceration on her skin.
meanings.sent2: The ulceration caused discomfort and distress.
meanings.sent3: The comical aspect of the situation was the awkwardness caused by the ulceration.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt heavy with the burden of ulceration in his body.
meanings.sent5: The ulceration was a glaring reminder of the need for proper care.
